snippet.title: World's longest aircraft is unveiled in UK
snippet.description:
Business / 28 February 2014
… powered flight. With a length of 302ft (92m) the new airship is about 60ft longer than the biggest airliners, the Airbus A380 and Boeing 747-8.

snippet.title: Boeing: 15 airlines warned over high-altitude ice
snippet.description:
Business / 23 November 2013
Fifteen airlines have been warned about the risk of ice forming on Boeing's new 747-8 and 787 Dreamliner planes. The issue - affecting some types…

snippet.title: Boeing's marketing chief says orders already in
snippet.description:
21 June 2011
The BBC speaks to Randy Tinseth, Boeing's marketing chief, after the 747-8 jumbo steals limelight on the first day of the Paris Air Show.

snippet.title: West Indies v England day four as it happened
snippet.description:
England / 1 March 2009
… from the wicketkeeper, his deft late cuts one of the highlights of the series so far. 2102: West Indies 747-8 With little else to cheer for,…
